divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my front porch when I thought I saw a red star, but when I got up I saw a circular object just above the trees.It was rotating, and the lights were clearly going around, but the vehicle was stand still with absolutely no noise at all. I watched it start to drop slightly then it went to the left behind the trees, and I lost site of it. At about 10:30 PM. Then I came back out with my husband to see if we could see it again, and this time there was a white light that was moving West toward Charleston WV, and this time it just disapeared into the mist. I have seen many objects in this area, and in my opinion they need to look into WV for a hot spot for UFS's.
Summary: Circular, red, and white rotating lights
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Fayetteville
There were no other sightings in Fayetteville on or around September 1st 2009
